text: The Makapuʻu Point Light is a lighthouse. It is on the island of Oʻahu. It has the largest lens of any lighthouse in the United States.Amateur Radio Light House Society, Makapuu point (Oahu) light #HAW-005.Radio Lighthouse Society, World List of Lights. It was put on the National Register of Historic Places in 1977. ==References== ==Other websites== *Aerial photograph Makapuʻu point light at Marinas.com. *Photograph of Makapuʻu Point hyperradiant lens, U.S.C.G. at lighthouse friends. *Aerial 360 Panorama of Makapuʻu Lighthouse and Makapuʻu Point at PanaViz.com *Satellite view at Google Maps. Category:Lighthouses Category:Buildings and structures in Hawaii Category:1909 establishments in Oceania Category:1900s establishments in Hawaii
title: Makapu'u Point Light
